channel.title: Final Devolution 2.3 (EXTREME PKING)
channel.description:
well its been about 2 months since the last release and this one by passes it with ease. this is alot better than my last releases. alot of time has gone into this server it was created 100% from devolution 7.0 and if any of you have ever used the original devo 7.0 ull see how much better this just is.
[B][U]NEXT RELEASE FEATURES. (2.5)[/U][/B] - auto casting fully made - more to come
[B][U]Features for 2.4[/U][/B]
- g maul special has been added. - ring of recoil added - more combat fixes (getting close to prefect combat) - arrows drop under players when ranging - arrows drop under npcs when ranging - plus some more which you don't need to know about.
[B][U]Features for 2.3[/U][/B]
[B][U]Melee[/U][/B] - 100% timed delays, no process is used at all, Events only. - 90% specials for the original 317 (just need a real msb spec and proper dragon hally graphics) - FIXED PVP damage, in the older versions you would hit alot of zero's, i have now changed the formula for damaging now it seems pretty spot on to how its surpose to be. - following while using melee.
[B][U] Ranging[/U][/B] - 100% timed delays, no process is used at all, Events only. - damage delays depend on the distance of the the two players or npc - arrow speeds, start heights, mid heights and end heights are prefect. i spent awhile working on this so they are 100% perfect. - deletes arrows for all bows apart from crystal bow. - following while in combat, fixed the damages for ranging on pvp
[B][U]Magic[/U][/B] - 100% timed delays, no process is used at all, Events only. - damage delays depend on the distance of the the two players or npc - magic speeds, start heights, mid heights and end heights are prefect. i spent awhile working on this so they are 100% perfect same as ranging. - deletes the correct amount of runes. - following while in combat. - splashes depending on your magic bonus and there magic defence. - 100% correct animations and projectiles for all spells apart from binds and confuse etc... - Fixed magic freezing, i had done something totally stupid which made an error but i figured out the problem so its fixed.
[B][U]Fishing[/U][/B] - nearly 100% fishing does everything rs does pretty much, you will need to move the npcs to the spots where you would like them to be there ids are found by searching for fishingMain, its the npcid or the case number there in.
[B][U]Cooking[/U][/B] cooking cooks all of the food you tell it to cook on fires and ranges.
[B][U] Thieving[/U][/B] can thieve off men and women, easy to add more just look up thieving in client.java
[B][U]Full 1v1 and multi zones[/U][/B] multizones and 1v1 areas have all been added in there correct places and work for all range melee and mage.
Summary - Pking, pking is pretty good, i mean its better than deltascape by along shot, but slightly less than battlescape cause of the max hits and his follow owns. everything pretty much works, all the prayers like str prayers def prayers and att prayers all add extra to what there surpose to add to and the protection prayers halfs the damage. - PVNPC, realy good pretty much perfect but no quite. - all the skills apart from thieving was 100% created by me aswel as the combat and most other things in the server, thieving was about 30% more work i pretty much made it better.
VIDEOS - some are old. fishing - [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ECQJBsXSyGk]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ECQJBsXSyGk[/url] pk follow (alot better now) - [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Lab2ZmhRAjs]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Lab2ZmhRAjs[/url] more coming soon. g maul, drops, ice blits rusning - http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=K55yEqO_qFU
[B][U]Download link 2.4 [/U][/B] [url=http://uppit.com/v/JKOTZL7D]http://uppit.com/v/JKOTZL7D[/url]
[B][U]Download link 2.3 [/U][/B]- sorry forget to re-add pking drops, i am adding now. [url=http://uppit.com/v/EIBXGG67]http://uppit.com/v/EIBXGG67[/url] [B][U]
CLIENT NEEDED[/U][/B] (if you do not use this client, the use of magic on players will crash your client.) [url=http://www.google.org/showthread.php?t=61244]http://www.google.org/showthread.php?t=61244[/url] [url=http://www.megaupload.com/?d=VW8Y5P6K]http://www.megaupload.com/?d=VW8Y5P6K[/url]
